page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content: The quality of life in this small area is remarkedly rich and varied. Traditionally centred on CHURCH and CHAPELS religious and social life is wholly intermingled in spite of the drop in religious services.Music has always been part of life here,bringing many visiting choirs.Many exhibitions are also held in places of worship.A biblical test being used to illustrate art craft and floral arrangements.The standard is high.Amongst older people this way of life still.The 1970s brought a number of"self sufficieners" The majority are still here,though no longer in the "pure" form.men follow a career or are self employed in some craft.Women keep goats,pigs and fowl and grow vegatables.Most are members of the community.
